lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley said on Thursday that he was confident they would have money to spend in January following positive talks with the board.

headline.print_headline: Swansea's Bradley Hopes to Have Money to Spend in January
headline.main: Swansea's Bradley Hopes to Have Money to Spend in January

snippet: Swansea City manager Bob Bradley said on Thursday that he was confident they would have money to spend in January following positive talks with the board....
